ValidationRule.description: An agent shouldn't change the CPA Indicator value if the prior value was one of the following: Opt-out - Refused Opt-out - Member not Enrolled Opt-in - Reimbursement not Confirmed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator Full', ISCHANGED(CPA_Funds_Paid__c), CPA_Funds_Paid__c > 0, OR( ISPICKVAL(CPA_Indicator__c , "Opt-out - Refused"), ISPICKVAL(CPA_Indicator__c, "Opt-out - Member not Enrolled"), ISPICKVAL(CPA_Indicator__c, "Opt-in - Reimbursement not Confirmed"), ISPICKVAL(CPA_Indicator__c, "Opt-in - Funds exhausted") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CPA Indicator for this member is in an Opt-out status. So you cannot enter a CPA Funds Paid amount
